DOC.detailed_description: Recent figure estimate 60 % Irish adult overweight obese . As obesity associate development insulin resistance , precede type 2 diabetes development decade , novel food base solution require improve glycaemic control attenuate insulin resistance . In current study insulin resistant individual undergo 4 study visit , 1 screen visit 3 subsequent visit . At 3 visit receive oral lipid load consist 100mL soya bean oil , follow either water control ; hydrolysate test parent protein hydrolysate derive . After undergo 4 hour hyperinsulinemic-euglycaemic clamp visit assess insulin sensitivity .
